description:
An important step for any math student

This course begins where we left off in Geometry and works its way through Trigonometry and Precalculus. More than 50 videos are included.

While a typical trigonometry course might focus on slightly different topics than a typical precalculus course, they’re really pretty similar, and this course will cover topics from both trigonometry and precalc.

Trigonometry is the study of triangles, so you might think its applications are limited. But what you’ll learn in trigonometry is actually going to help you with shapes other than triangles, like circles. And you’ll use it all the time once you get to calculus.

Key concepts

The major topics we'll cover are:

  • Angles
  • The unit circle
  • Trig functions and trig identities
  • Graphing trig functions
  • The law of sines and the law of cosines
  • Polar coordinates and graphing polar curves
  • Parametric curves

A complete course

Currently, this is a video-only course. Over time, I'll continue to add notes, quizzes, and other video content to the course.
title: Become a Trigonometry Master
